data.title: Intellexaâ€™s Predator spyware used to hack iPhone of journalist in Angola, research says
data.summary: Amnesty International says it found evidence that a government customer of Intellexa, a sanctioned surveillance vendor, used its Predator spyware against a prominent journalist in Angola.

data.title: Metaâ€™s own research found parental supervision doesnâ€™t really help curb teensâ€™ compulsive social media use
data.summary: An internal research study at Meta found that parental supervision may not help teens regulate their social media, and teens with trauma are more inclined to overuse social media.
